remarks: Group multiple (exponentiation) operation at a negative integer. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgnncl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgnncl.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgneg.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
mulgneg $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ N e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) -> ( -u N .x. X ) = ( I ` ( N .x. X ) ) ) $.
